title: Text to Morse Code Converter
description: A text based python project that converts user input text into morse code in the console.

title: Weather App
description: A weather application that fetches real-time weather data from an API and displays it to the user.

title: Personal Blog Website
description: A personal blog website built with Flask, featuring user authentication and CRUD functionality for posts.
